telnyx.registration:
[{trunk_name}]
type=registration
outbound_auth={trunk_name}-auth
server_uri=sip:sip.telnyx.com
client_uri=sip:{username}@sip.telnyx.com
contact_user={username}
retry_interval=60
expiration=300
telnyx.endpoint:
[{trunk_name}-endpoint]
type=endpoint
transport=transport-udp
context={context}
disallow=all
allow={codecs}
outbound_auth={trunk_name}-auth
aors={trunk_name}-aor
from_user={did}
from_domain=sip.telnyx.com
send_pai=yes
send_rpid=yes
direct_media=no
rtp_symmetric=yes
force_rport=yes
rewrite_contact=yes
ice_support=no

signalwire.endpoint:
[{trunk_name}-endpoint]
type=endpoint
transport=transport-udp
outbound_auth={trunk_name}-auth
aors={trunk_name}-aor
disallow=all
allow={codecs}
from_user={from_user}
from_domain={space_name}.sip.signalwire.com
media_encryption=sdes
context={context}
rewrite_contact=yes
rtp_symmetric=yes
force_rport=yes
direct_media=no
ice_support=no

custom_credential.endpoint:
[{trunk_name}-endpoint]

transport=transport-udp
outbound_auth={trunk_name}-auth
aors={trunk_name}-aor
disallow=all
allow={codecs}
from_user={from_user}
from_domain={sip_server}
context={context}
rewrite_contact=yes
rtp_symmetric=yes
force_rport=yes
direct_media=no
custom_credential.registration:
[{trunk_name}-registration]
type=registration
server_uri=sip:{sip_server}:{sip_port}
client_uri=sip:{username}@{sip_server}
outbound_auth={trunk_name}-auth
retry_interval=60
expiration=3600
